Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that the nonce key is invalid.

<Note>
  `InvalidNonceKeyError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all
  supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidNonceKeyError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### nonceKey

`bigint`
the invalid nonceKey used
